Feature.Name: Elemental Water
Feature.Text: Lustrous fish scales replace leather or cloth on this item, and metal portions are instead crafted from seashells and worked coral as hard as any metal.

MagicProperty.Name: Creator - Elemental Water
MagicProperty.Description: Lustrous fish scales replace leather or cloth on this item, and metal portions are instead crafted from seashells and worked coral as hard as any metal.
